turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. Could you help me with placing an order at Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a caffè mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: bless you, would you like to add milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you very much. Yes, I would like soy milk.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Whipped cream is fine. But could you please make it light whipped cream?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what size would you like that in?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like that in a venti.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, which location would you like to pick up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one that's located in Dresher, Pennsylvania on Virginia Drive.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i have ordered you a venti caffe mocha with soy milk and light whipped cream to be picked up at the starbucks on viginia drive, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your drink will be ready in 5 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you so much for your help.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that was it for today. Thank you.
